org.jclouds.gogrid.services

Interface GridServerAsyncClient


  • public interface GridServerAsyncClient
    Provides asynchronous access to GoGrid via their REST API.

    Author:
    Adrian Cole, Oleksiy Yarmula
    See Also:
    GridServerClient,
